Essay Validation Made Easy

Validate student essays with ease

LitBrain provides educators with an easy-to-use solution to the growing problem of artifically generated essays.

LitBrain assists educators by not only automatically grading essays and papers, but by additionally detecting cases of plagarism - in the form of artifically written papers.

Grade & Validate Essays Instantly!

1

Upload

Simply upload or type students' work, and let the AI grade and validate them for you! You can even upload multiple files at a time!

2

Loading

Our AI takes a while to load, so please be patient! This is because the AI compares your submissions to billions of existing word structures, and tries to find matches!

3

Validation

Our AI automatically validates students' work for you, so you don't have to worry about plagarism! Advanced graphs and statistics are generated to determine how likely it was that uploaded work was generated/written by an AI.

4

Grading Beta Feature

Our AI performs advanced analyis of students's work, and determines an appropriate grade. This feature is in development and may not be 100% accurate.
